messages.subject: happy expectations
messages.msgSnippet: In a message dated 4/26/02 3:01:59 PM Mountain Daylight Time, ... I haven t either. I expect mine to be kind and honest and friendly and responsible.  In
messages.messageBody:
In a message dated 4/26/02 3:01:59 PM Mountain Daylight Time,
tinkiechelle1@... writes:


> i have only been homeschooling for about 3 months, and i have never once
>

I haven't either.

I expect mine to be kind and honest and friendly and responsible. In
exchange for them meeting my high standards, I strive to be patient,
accommodating, amusing and reliable.

The idea that there are people who think unschoolers could be parents who
just kind of ignore their kids for years is an interesting phenomenon.

Sandra


[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]
